description:
Verify that a user can purge (delete) all tasks from the database in one action and receives appropriate confirmation and feedback.

Navigate to the "Purge Tasks" screen in the app.
Click the "PURGE ALL TASKS" button.
Review and acknowledge the confirmation dialog ("This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?").
Click the "PURGE" button to confirm.
Observe a feedback message indicating successful deletion.
Confirm that the task list is now empty and no tasks are available for purge.
Check that the confirm success message showing  Purge all taks

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the URL http://localhost:5173/ to launch the application.
Navigate within the application to reach the 'Purge Tasks' screen.
Select the 'PURGE ALL TASKS' button on the screen.
Review the confirmation dialog that appears with the message 'This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?' and acknowledge its presence.
Confirm the purge action by selecting the 'PURGE' button in the dialog.
Observe the feedback message indicating that tasks have been successfully deleted from the database.
Verify that the task list is empty and that there are no available tasks for further deletion.
Ensure that a confirmation success message with the text 'Purge all taks' is visible on the screen.
Capture a screenshot of the final state to confirm the purge action was completed correctly.

description:
Verify that a user can select and purge (bulk delete) specific tasks, and that the selected tasks are accurately removed from the task database.

Navigate to the "Purge Tasks" screen in the app.
Review the list of done tasks and not done tasks.
Select one or more tasks by ticking their respective checkboxes.
Click the "PURGE SELECTED" button.
Observe the confirmation message indicating which tasks were purged.
Check the main task list to confirm the selected tasks are no longer present.
